subject: RE: [junit] RE: Separate Package for Test Cases or not ?
msgSnippet: ... the ... hmmm...  I would, too.  Thankfully I haven t ever seen unit tests for 3rd party/non-open-source products, so my illusion of trust in the package is
messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
"David Stagner" wrote:
> And if i were given a
> set of unit tests from a vendor that clearly did not thoroughly test
the
> public interface of the software, i would immediately distrust the
> software in question.

hmmm... I would, too. Thankfully I haven't ever seen unit tests for
3rd party/non-open-source products, so my illusion of trust in the
package is fairly secure. :)

-jason
